summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Golf Drive, from 12th Avenue South to 10th Avenue South, and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers, all in accordance with Resolution No. 8249 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
